achievements: Developed a highly configurable reporting system using ASP.NET Core MVC and SQL Server, initially for accounts receivable but designed for easy reuse across other modules. Created a presets module to save user configurations as global or personal presets, significantly speeding up report generation.

Identified a critical issue in the existing third-party utility billing system for heatpump usage, leading to revenue loss. Built a new system to process weekly CSV dumps, handle errors, and apply rules to generate accurate invoices for each lease, significantly increasing revenue (by 3x) by capturing previously missed charges.

Created a comprehensive in-house library application using ASP.NET Core MVC, enabling seamless calendar management, recurring events, and meeting room bookings. Implemented key modules for authentication (Windows and Identity), role management, calendar, event scheduling, link sharing, and advanced search functionality.

projects.heading: Questionner - MERN stack wap
projects.tagline: Tech community: Ask, answer, vote for the best solutions.
features: User Authentication: Users can authenticate using their Gmail accounts (on the server-side with Passport).
Question Management: Users can create, edit, and delete question posts.
Voting System: Users can upvote and downvote answers to express their preferences.
Post and Comment Ordering: Posts and comments are displayed in the order of upvotes
Search Functionality: Users can search for specific posts using tags or keywords.
Profile Viewing: Users can view their profiles to see all their activities in one place.
Latest Posts: A preview of the most recent posts are given on the homepage as teasers.

achievements: Developed scalable and efficient HTTP APIs utilizing Node.js, deployed on AWS Lambda and API Gateway, leveraging the Serverless Framework for streamlined deployment and management.

Restructured existing code of 2 projects done in old framework (C++/Python) into new framework (Python3) by breaking down huge single classes into modular relevant classes using Object Oriented Programming (OOPS).

Implemented file sync feature using pythonâ€™s pathlib which effectively identifies changed files recursively and selectively replaces them, reducing the file transfer speed by 80%, from 30 seconds to below 5 seconds.
Built 6 game prototypes as a solo developer for Lightpong (1D gaming console) on the firmware using Python that accounts for 40% of all the games in production for product launch.

achievements: Produced and presented over 5 successful prototypes, securing client approval for subsequent large-scale projects. Exceptional proficiency in crafting compelling proof of concepts that resonate with clients.

Built a game called Sling racer, a hyper casual single-player web game with JavaScript in Phaser game engine with P2 physics and procedural generation that was released in MX Player with over 100,000 plays.
Implemented a 3D tower defense mobile game in C# using AI agents, collision system, DG tweening and object pooling. Integrated 3D models, animation, and UI to deliver a complete end to end game.

achievements: Collaborated to develop a node based editor tool in an agile management for Byju's early learn app in Unity with C# in a 3-member team that made the building pipeline faster by 80% compared to the previously used tool.

Created interactive educational games using the developed tool for Byju's in collaboration with Disney, with a focus on developing reusable, child-friendly multiple-choice question (MCQ) and classification games.
Integrated backend of a multiplayer game that updated all statistics using Microsoft Azureâ€™s PlayFab for a car racing game made with C# in Unity 3D.
